overview:
Andres Davidovits is the Co-founder and CEO of rrripple.

Andres has been a product visionary since the creation of his first company called Eyecron (a PhotoVoice technology) business. After Eyecron, Andres went in-house to Palm, where he began as a Product Manager and then developed and ran the Palm Usability Program (created to test the Pre device). Andres had a vision for developing a platform for sharing media within groups while he was organizing 50 TIECon Live volunteers.

Andres is a graduate of UC Berkeley with a BA, Media Specialist.
